title: Sustainable Fashion: The Industry's Reckoning
description: A 60-second lesson on Sustainable Fashion: The Industry's Reckoning.

hook.text: 92 million tons of textile waste are produced every year.

buildup.text: Sustainable fashion aims to reduce environmental impact through ethical sourcing, slow production, and circular design.

discovery.text: Circular fashion designs clothes to be repaired, resold, or recycled.

twist.text: Many brands 'greenwash' â€” claiming sustainability while barely changing practices.

climax.text: Stella McCartney, Eileen Fisher, and Reformation prove luxury and sustainability can coexist .

punchline.text: Sustainable fashion isn't a trend. It's a survival requirement for the industry.

quiz.question: What is 'greenwashing' in the fashion industry?
options: Brands falsely claiming sustainability while barely changing practices
Dyeing all fabrics green for eco-branding
A washing technique that reduces water usage
